definition: lit. to pierce the wall to steal a light (idiom)/fig. to study diligently in the face of hardship
chisel/to bore a hole/to chisel or dig/(literary) (bound form) certain/authentic/irrefutable/also pr. [zuo4]

sentences.english: We still remember who drilled the wall to steal the car light Yin do?
sentences.chinese: 大家還記得那位鑿壁偷光的車胤嗎？
